long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Learn GRE words every time you open a tab! This extension will open a card with a fresh GRE vocabulary word and its meaning when you open a new chrome tab. Switch to study mode and guess the meaning of the word to judge your understanding. Choose between 3 difficulty levels to suit your need.
